name: Paws & Claws: Pampered Pets Resort 3D
overview: Spoil your pets to your heart’s content with Paws & Claws Pampered Pets Resort 3D – an all-new virtual simulation game in 3D! As a newcomer to the pet caring business, players start out at a small accommodation and over time, gain more experience to transform their shabby digs into an elegant resort their clients desire. From administering vaccinations and acupuncture to learning aromatherapy and earning a cosmetology degree – it’s important to keep your clients happy by giving your pets the best care and comfort they deserve.
